Articles.Content:
Hello, all. DennisLinux here. Today, i present you the craft that i have been working hard on lately- the gleaming glorious Waraxe Light Scout Craft! So, i did not have the specs for you guys, but they will be on very soon. If anyone had tried it and had criticism over it, post it below. I accept any comments and encourage constructive comments. Please enjoy this hot rod and fly safe!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Download Link: http://www./download/gd8d0ny9esko3ob/Waraxe_Light_Scout_Craft.craft

Dennislinux
BTW, it is really jeb on board so the stats may go a little over the normal top. It is usually known that he will strap SRBs on this but Bill managed to stop him.

Could you provide more information about your craft please? Such as a operations manual, kinda like how Cupcake does.... However, how you set it up is up to you, I just more information about it.

leit
